Uses of Package
src.exceptions

Packages that use src.exceptions
src.game

Classes in src.exceptions used by src.game
CityNameExistsException
          Exception thrown when an attempt is made to make a new city, but the city name already exists.
EnemyDiedException
          Exception thrown when an enemy dies.
EnemySpawnNotDefinedException
          Exception that is thrown when the engine tries to spawn an enemy, but there are no enemies defined to spawn.
NoPlayerException
          Exception thrown when there is no player.
NoSuchCityException
          Exception thrown when the game tries to read from a city that does not exist.
PlayerEnteredException
          Exception class for if the player successfully enters a land object.
 

Classes in src.exceptions used by src.land
EnemyDiedException
          Exception thrown when an enemy dies.
PlayerEnteredException
          Exception class for if the player successfully enters a land object.
 

Classes in src.exceptions used by src.scenario
BadScenarioFileException
          Exception thrown when there is an error parsing the scenario xml file.
